 2021-01792021-03-23,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectExtraordinary Borrowing Authority 2021-2022
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance to borrow money under extraordinary circumstances for the payment of any obligation of the Government of Canada until the earlier of September 30, 2021 and the day on which the Economic Statement Implementation Act, 2020, comes into force.
